GetTaskFromSlug.query:
query GetTaskFromSlug($slug: String!) {
  task(slug: $slug) {
    ...TaskPageFields
    __typename
  }
}

fragment TaskPageFields on Task {
  id
  title
  taskType
  namespace
  isClosed
  rewardType
  rewardAmount
  rewardToken {
    ...TokenFields
    __typename
  }
  rewardNft {
    name
    chainId
    address
    tokenId
    previewImageCid
    previewVideoCid
    __typename
  }
  createdAt
  expirationDate
  completedAt
  archivedAt
  xp
  rewardTokenId
  numberOfWinners
  missionDoc
  instructionsDoc
  submissionType
  GatingAchievement {
    ...AchievementFields
  }
  totalSubmissionsCount
  totalBountyClaimersCount
  bountyClaimedByUser
  userCanManage
  Winners {
    ...UserAvatarFields
    __typename
  }
  UserSubmission {
    ...SubmissionCardFields
    __typename
  }
  Category {
    id
    name
    slug
    emoji
    __typename
  }
  Dao {
    ...DaoLogoFields
    id
    namespace
    coverCid
    ogImageCid
    __typename
  }
  BountySteps {
    ...BountyStepFields
    __typename
  }
  ogImageCid
  __typename
}

fragment TokenFields on Token {
  id
  address
  name
  symbol
  decimals
  chainId
  updatedAt
  usdPrice
  __typename
}

fragment UserAvatarFields on User {
  id
  username
  address
  avatarCid
  __typename
}

fragment SubmissionCardFields on Submission {
  id
  content
  didWin
  createdAt
  User {
    ...UserAvatarFields
    __typename
  }
  Task {
    id
    submissionType
    namespace
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment DaoLogoFields on Dao {
  name
  logoCid
  __typename
}

fragment BountyStepFields on BountyStep {
  id
  bountyActionKey
  isFulfilled
  data
  orderIndex
  title
  description
  actionLink
  __typename
}

fragment AchievementFields on Achievement {
  id
  slug
  name
  description
  category
  color
  imageCid
}
